# fluentToMessage() function

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Compile a [Fluent.Pattern](https://projectfluent.org/fluent.js/syntax/classes/pattern.html) (i.e. the value of a Fluent message or an attribute) into a [Message](./messageformat.message.md) data object.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function fluentToMessage(ast: Fluent.Pattern, { detectNumberSelection }?: FluentToMessageOptions): PatternMessage | SelectMessage;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  ast | Fluent.Pattern |  |
|  { detectNumberSelection } | [FluentToMessageOptions](./fluent.fluenttomessageoptions.md) | _(Optional)_ |

**Returns:**

[PatternMessage](./messageformat.patternmessage.md) \| [SelectMessage](./messageformat.selectmessage.md)
